segments.text: A funny thing happened to me the other day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I was just thinking about someone I went to school with , this boy I was quite friendly with in third grade . We used to hang out together - he lived next door - but then my parents moved and I changed schools and never saw him again .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I was walking down Nan Jing Dong Lu ( Nan-Jing E . Rd . ) during my lunch break thinking about this boy-I have no idea why I was thinking about him .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes . And suddenly I heard someone call my name . I turned around and there was this man looking at me . I didn't recognize him at all , but he obviously knew who I was .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , yeah , that's embarrassing when that happens .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You got it . Well , he walked up to me and said my name again and then I realized it was the boy I had been thinking about , the one from third grade !
segments.speaker: S1
